<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lunging Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=4838) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 149 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Reactive Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2256); [Lunge](/Feats.aspx?ID=4784)

**Requirements**
You are wielding a melee weapon

</column>

---

Your body coiled to strike, you can lash out at distant enemies. While you are in this stance, you can use Reactive Strike against a creature that is outside your reach but within the reach you would have with a Lunge. If you do, you increase your range with the Strike by 5 feet.
name: Lunging Stance
requirement: You are wielding a melee weapon
